definition: to support/to bear the weight of (a building)
to support/to sustain/to erect/to raise/branch/division/to draw money/classifier for rods such as pens and guns, for army divisions and for songs or compositions
to bear/to carry/to hold/to continue/to undertake/to take charge/owing to/due to/to receive
surname Cheng/Cheng (c. 2000 BC), third of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God

sentences.english: The critical speed of one turbopump rotor on elastic support was computed by FEMQZ.
sentences.chinese: 计算分析了某涡轮泵转子在弹性支承下的临界转速。

sentences.english: The automatic pipet flusher is composed of a washing plug disk and a support mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 它由一个冲洗插盘和一个支承机构组成。

sentences.english: Fasten the pulley and the support block to your worktable.
sentences.chinese: 拴紧对你的工作台的滑车和支承区块。

sentences.english: The interior pairs of cables will be supported on saddles.
sentences.chinese: 当中的各对拉索支承在鞍座上。

sentences.english: A finite element method is applied to analyze the static response of structure of two-layered beam resting on elastic supports.
sentences.chinese: 用有限单元法分析了双层弹性支承梁的静力响应。

sentences.english: The generalized active forces of the beam are applied forces of the moving support and elastic forces of the beam.
sentences.chinese: 梁的广义主动力取为动支承的作用力和弹性力。

sentences.english: Design of supporting and locating position is an indispensable part of fixturing design process.
sentences.chinese: 定位支承设计是装夹设计过程的核心部分。

sentences.english: Hump Supporting is used to support random packing. It can increase the pass area of gas phase.
sentences.chinese: 驼峰支承用于支承散堆填料，可以增大气相通过面积。

sentences.english: Hump Supporting is used to support random packing. It can increase the pass area of gas phase.
sentences.chinese: 驼峰支承用于支承散堆填料，可以增大气相通过面积。

sentences.english: Two kinds of soft support and hard support for dynamic balancing machine.
sentences.chinese: 动平衡机分软支承和硬支撑两种。

sentences.english: The model is mounted on gas bearings.
sentences.chinese: 模型支承于空气静压轴承。

sentences.english: According to the operation and check for one and half years, such gyroscopic support is good in performance.
sentences.chinese: 改造后经一年半的运行检验，回转支承性能良好。

sentences.english: The aperture restrictor is an important component in the hydrostatic support system.
sentences.chinese: 液体静压支承中节流器是不可缺少的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: Weld the sealing seat to wall to support the front of soot-blower.
sentences.chinese: 密封支座与炉墙焊接固定，支承吹灰器头部。

sentences.english: This paper discusses how to increase the blast resistance of beams effectively by elastic and damping supports at the ends of beams.
sentences.chinese: 通过在梁端部设置弹性和阻尼支承来提高梁的抗力。

sentences.english: Compared with the two, the soft support balancing machine's swing frame is relatively soft.
sentences.chinese: 两者相比，软支承平衡机的摆架比较软。

definition: bolt (male component of nut and bolt)/screw
a building/the frame of a building/roof beam/truss
